abstract: Despite holding many positions of note in government and business, John E. Zuccotti, or at least his name, has achieved an extraordinary level of notoriety thanks to the demonstrators on Wall Street.
snippet: Despite holding many positions of note in government and business, John E. Zuccotti, or at least his name, has achieved an extraordinary level of notoriety thanks to the demonstrators on Wall Street.

headline.main: A Public Servant Whose Name Is Now on Protesters' Lips
headline.print_headline: A Public Servant Linked to a Protest’s Home
